sn35.4:4.4: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with proper understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn35.4:4.12: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with proper understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn35.4:4.13: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple becomes disillusioned with sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and phenomena.
sn35.4:4.16: When freed, they know ‘it is freed’.
sn35.4:4.17: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual life has been lived, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
